price: 17. En zij krijgen daar een beker te drinken gemengd met gember.
arabic: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wayus'qawna fīhā kasan kāna mizājuhā zanjabīlan
translations: And they will be given to drink
